title: Computational Ethnographic Research Methods in Digital Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ethnographic research methods and understanding of digital learning environments
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course applying computational ethnographic approaches to large-scale learners through BYOD microlearning modules using mobile devices

learning_goals: Explain core concepts of three computational ethnographic approaches: virtual ethnography, quantitative ethnography, and computational ethnography
Design procedures for collecting and analyzing ethnographic data in digital learning environments
Conduct small-scale ethnographic research cases using mobile microlearning tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
